front.title: CloudAudit 1.0 - Automated Audit, Assertion, Assessment, and Assurance API (A6)

abstract.t: CloudAudit provides an open, extensible and secure interface that allows cloud computing providers to expose Audit, Assertion, Assessment, and Assurance (A6) information for cloud infrastructure (IaaS), platform (PaaS), and application (SaaS) services to authorized clients.
